ul.li:
Include these codes as defined in urn:iso:std:iso:11073:10101
CodeDisplay
475172Pressure Control
475147PC: Pressure Control, AC: Assist Control — Assist-controlled, pressure-controlled ventilation with backup respiratory rate, allowing spontaneous breathing during the entire respiratory cycle. May include selectable adjuncts.
475148PC: Pressure Control, AC: Assist Control — Assist-controlled, pressure-controlled ventilation with backup respiratory rate, with tidal volume target and pressure regulation, allowing spontaneous breathing during the entire respiratory cycle. May include selectable adjuncts.
475154PC: Pressure Control, PSV: Pressure Support Ventilation — Pressure-controlled, triggered ventilation with expiratory synchronization and backup respiratory rate. May include selectable adjuncts.
475197BiLevel Airway Pressure Ventilation
475201Volume Control Ventilation

description.value: Dieses ValueSet enthält Codes um die verschiedenen Beatmungsmodis abzubilden

PC: Pressure Control, AC: Assist Control — Assist-controlled, pressure-controlled ventilation with backup respiratory rate, with tidal volume target and pressure regulation, allowing spontaneous breathing during the entire respiratory cycle. May include selectable adjuncts.
PC: Pressure Control, PSV: Pressure Support Ventilation — Pressure-controlled, triggered ventilation with expiratory synchronization and backup respiratory rate. May include selectable adjuncts.
